name: Dream Catcher (itch) (kovalok)
description:
You are trying to get a good night sleep  but mysterious dreams are coming. They seem nice but you need to check to be extra sure. Banish the bad (red) dreams and let the good (green) ones come to you so you can rest all night. If you get too many bad dreams you will wake up. Try to sleep as many nights as possible. Done as a part of Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Controls:

Check dream: Mouse pointer

Banish dream: Mouse 1
